name: Still Run Stay Slash
description:
This is a game I made for LÖVE JAM 2022.

How To Play

Extract and run the .exe file to play the game.

Controls: WASD, Left Mouse Button

Music:

Soundeffects made in jsfxr - 8 bit sound maker and online sfx generator

Sprite Image made in Gimp 2.10

Programming: Visual Studio Code

More Description

This game is a 2D game with an objective of gaining scores.

The game was developed by one person(me).

The premise of the game is to control Still(character on ground) to right and left avoiding rocks falling down.

Still needs to carry batteries to the left side to gain 100 scores.

Stay(character with a sword) can leap from left to right and destroy rocks preventing Still from taking damange.

Stay can deal up to 10 damage scale if the "Left Mouse Button" was held for 2.5 seconds(game-time).

On taking damage, Still will drop the battery and will need to go to the right side to carry a new one.

There are 3 powerups in this game. The heart will give 1 health. The sheild will sheild Still for 10 seconds(game-time).

The times-two will help gaining scores two times for 10 seconds(game-time).
